mapper.select: SELECT R.NO, R.TICKETING_NO, M.NO, MB.ID, R.CONTENT, R.STAR_RATING, R.ENROLL_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE, R.DEL_YN FROM REVIEW R JOIN TICKETING T ON R.TICKETING_NO = T.NO JOIN SCREEN_INFO SI ON T.SCREEN_INFO = SI.NO JOIN MEMBER MB ON T.BUYER_NO = MB.NO JOIN MOVIE M ON SI.MOVIE_NO = M.NO WHERE M.NO = '1' AND R.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY R.NO DESC
